nodes.text: The ex of Monti Calay was a male individual who once dated Calay at some point before he started working for the First Order. During a security check by Corellian Security Forces, Calay blushed when he saw his name listed on a datapad with other known acquaintances, and was suprised that CorSec tracked that information. At the time, he had not thought about his ex for a long time and did not want to be reminded of him.
Monti Calay's ex was first mentioned in the 2019 novel Resistance Reborn written by Rebecca Roanhorse.
